attributes.action: Create recycling bins outside tube stations in london
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Now that papers such as the london lite, the london paper and the metro are available for free more and more people just throw them in the bin! As we know paper can be recycled,and in order to cut down in the unnecessary build up of land fill we should recycle. I petition that outside  all tube stations in london a recycling bin should be built. I think this even though it is just a small change it could help us become a greener country.
